name: transport, passenger car | transport, passenger car | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4587/documentation

This activity provides an average transport in a passenger car. It does so by linking specific "transport, passenger car", both with internal combustion engine and electric, into a generic product.

This activity provides an average transport in passenger car.
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4922:Other passenger land transport

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average transport in a passenger car. The average takes into account internal combustion engines and electric cars. For the first type, the average accounts for different car classes(EURO 3, EURO 4 and EURO 5). These at its turn, are an average of the different car sizes (small, medium and large) and  fuel types (petrol, diesel and natural gas). For the electric car, it takes into account a medium size electric car.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: production volume of electric car is estimated based on global production volumes

flow.name: transport, passenger car
flow.category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4922:Other passenger land transport

exchanges.description:
Assumption.

Based on the production volume of this exchange divided by the total sum of the  production volumes from all the inputs. The production volumes is calculated based on the global production volume, as found in the global dataset "transport, passenger car, electric", assuming that the European production volume is 4 times smaller.

defaultProvider.category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4921:Urban and suburban passenger land transport

exchanges.description: calculated value. Based on the production volume of this exchange divided by the total sum of the  production volumes from all the inputs. The production volumes are obtained from the ecoinvent datasets where these inputs are produced as reference product.
